Headline: Howard-bound Red Line trains bypassing 63rd/Dan Ryan Station
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 63rd/Dan Ryan station due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 63rd/Dan Ryan station due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
